mobiles.name: smurf
mobiles.long_description: A vampire smurf is singing and walking along.
mobiles.description:
A cute little blue smurf with a white hat and white boots.  You have a sudden
urge to crush him.

mobiles.name: smurf
mobiles.long_description: A vampire smurf is here, picking berries.
mobiles.description: A small smurf is quietly picking berries.  He seems to hardly notice you.

mobiles.name: insane malkavian smurf
mobiles.long_description: Insane Malkavian Smurf is here, mumbling something to himself.
mobiles.description:
Insane Malkavian is drooling as usual. Insane Malkavian Smurf isn't liked
much by the other smurfs. They fear his madness, not to mention his smell.

mobiles.name: handy smurf
mobiles.long_description: Vampire Handy Smurf is building something here.
mobiles.description:
Handy is always building something.  He never takes a break.  Why don't you
give him a break, like all of his bones.

mobiles.name: sleepy smurf
mobiles.long_description: Vampire Sleepy Smurf is sleep walking here.
mobiles.description:
Sleepy never gets enough sleep.  You would think he was in torper.  I wonder
if he has ever stayed up a whole day without sleeping.

mobiles.name: psycho smurf
mobiles.long_description: Psycho Vampire Smurf is here, frothing at the mouth.
mobiles.description:
Psycho is a total nut.  He lifts weights, eats rocks, and smashes things all
the time.  Right now he's threatening to smash your kneecaps.

mobiles.name: grumpy smurf
mobiles.long_description: Vampire Grumpy Smurf is here, swearing.
mobiles.description: Grumpy has never been happy in his whole life.  So why don't you just end it?

mobiles.name: jokey smurf
mobiles.long_description: Vampire Jokey Smurf is here, holding a present.
mobiles.description:
Jokey loves to give people presents.  Too bad the present explodes when opened.
Oh well, to each his own.

mobiles.name: smurfette
mobiles.long_description: Vampire Smurfette is here looking beautiful, undead, but beautiful.
mobiles.description:
Smurfette is the cutest little smurf you've ever seen.  If only she were your
size.  I wonder how much she charges the other smurfs.

mobiles.name: papa smurf
mobiles.long_description: Vampire Papa Smurf is practicing magic here.
mobiles.description:
Yep, its Papa Smurf all right.  Red hat and boots and the funny little white
beard.  Papa Smurf is the prince of the Vampire Smurfs, and is a master of
the Dominate discipline.
That is why Papa Smurf is so popular among the ladies.

mobiles.name: gargamel
mobiles.long_description: WereGargamel is here, cursing out the smurfs.
mobiles.description:
Gargamel has never done anything right in his life.  He has caught smurfs
before but always lets them escape.  He brings true meaning to the word moron.

mobiles.name: azreal cat
mobiles.long_description: WerePussycat Azreal is here, licking himself.
mobiles.description:
Gargamel's worthless werecat.  He is just about as dumb as Gargamel.
He should just grab a smurf in his teeth and chew away.

objects.name: bunch berries smurfberries
objects.description: A bunch of delicious looking smurfberries lie here.

objects.name: glasses
objects.description: An odd pair of glasses has been left here.

objects.name: smurf hat
objects.description: A smurf hat has been left here.

objects.name: axe small
objects.description: A small axe has been dropped here.

objects.name: necklace
objects.description: A small necklace is lying on the ground.

objects.name: pink potion
objects.description: A pink potion is barely visible on the ground.

objects.name: wand
objects.description: A small wand lies on the ground.

objects.name: key
objects.description: A tiny key is lying on the ground.

objects.name: well
objects.description: A small smurfy well is here.

objects.name: key
objects.description: A key to Gargamel's door lies here.

rooms.name: Dimly Lit Path
rooms.description:
This path is made of crushed granite with curious blue streaks in it.
the path continues north to a village, or south to the west gate.

exits.description: The path continues toward the village.
The path back toward the forest.

rooms.name: Dimly Lit Path
rooms.description:
This section of the road is badly worn and frequently traversed.  There is
faint singing to the north.  The road back to the forest lies to the south.

exits.description: The path continues toward the village.

rooms.name: Dimly Lit Path
rooms.description:
This section of the road is badly worn and frequently traversed.  Singing is
getting stronger to the north.  The road back to the forest lies to the south.

rooms.name: Entrance to Smurf Village
rooms.description:
You stand at the entrance to a tiny village.  You can see across the whole
village easily.  Little blue creatures with white hats and boots and little 
fluffy tails scamper about.  They sing continuously.  The singing is getting
on your nerves and you have the urge to squash them.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
You are way too big to be using this road.  But who cares.  Who's gonna stop
you?  These little blue smurfs?  The singing is growing intense.  Your ears
are starting to ring.  Smurfy Road continues to the north, west, and east.
There is still time to turn back and go south.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
You continue to travel down Smurfy Road.  Isn't it just smurfy?  Smurfy road
continues its smurfy path to the smurfy north, smurfy west, and smurfy south.
A smurfy home lies to the smurfy east.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
Oh boy, another smurfy road!  Smurfy Road goes north and south here.  There
is a smurfy, mushroom home to the west.  A beautiful smurfberry patch is to
the east.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
Smurfy Road continues to smurf here.  It smurfs to the south and smurfs to
an end to the north.  A smurfberry patch is to the east.  A stone path lies
to the west.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
A smurfy well lies here in the middle of Smurfy Road.  A fence separates
the smurfs from harm to the north.  A berry patch is to the east.  Smurfy
Road continues to to the south and west.

extra_descr_data.description:
A small well is here.  Just the right size if you're a smurf.  But big
enough for you to get some water from.  I'm sure the smurfs wont mind.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
A corner of smurfy road is where you stand.  A smurfy fence blocks passage
to the east or south.  A smurfy home is to the north.  Smurfy Road goes back
to the west.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
Western corner of Smurfy Road.  You can continue to smurf down the road
to the east and north.  You can also smurf into a smurfy home to the south.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
There's no place like smurf.  There's no place like smurf.  Sorry wrong
movie.  A smurfy home is to the west.  Papa Smurf's backyard is to the
north but you can't go there.  Smurfy Road continues to the south and
east.

rooms.name: Stone Path
rooms.description:
You are walking along a cute little stone path.  To the south lies Papa
Smurf's house.  A Smurfy house is to the west.  Smurfy road is to the east.
Everything is so peaceful here.  You could stay forever.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
Yet another part of Smurfy Road.  Hey if you go west its the last
section of Smurfy Road.  You can go back to the smurfy well to the east.

rooms.name: Smurfy Road
rooms.description:
The last piece of Smurfy Road.  You can go back to Smurfy Road to the east.
A nice, beautiful, smurfy, mushroom home is to the south.  In the distance to
the north you can see Gargamel's Castle.

rooms.name: Smurfberry Patch
rooms.description:
Delicious smurfberries grow here.  You could probably eat a year's worth of
smurfberries in one sitting.  Smurfy Road is back to the west.  Another
smurfberry patch is to the north.

rooms.name: Smurfberry Patch
rooms.description:
Another patch of smurfberries is growing here.  The smell is driving your
nostrils crazy.  It almost, ALMOST, makes you forget all the singing going
on.  Smurfy Road is to the west, while smurfberry patches are to the north
and south.

rooms.name: Smurfberry Patch
rooms.description:
The northernmost of the smurfberry patches grows here.  It looks just
as scrumptious as all the rest.  Just take a few; they'll never know.  Smurfy
Road is to the west.  A smurfberry patch is to the south.

rooms.name: Insane Malkavian Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
You rip the roof of the home to get a good look inside.  
Well, what did you expect, it's just one big padded cell.
Smurfy Road is back to the south.

rooms.name: Vampire Handy Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
This home was well built.  Of course, until you rip it apart you big meany
you.  Tools are all over the place.  Too small for you to use.  Smurfy Road is
back to the west.

rooms.name: Psycho Vampire Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
Psycho is anything but wimpy.  So is his house.  It actually took you a 
couple of minutes to destroy his house.  Better watch out -- he might be
a little mad at you.  Smurfy Road is back to the north.

rooms.name: Vampire Sleepy Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
Be vewy vewy quiet. Vampire Sleepy Smurf is probably sleeping.
You see so many beds you can't even tell if he is here.
Maybe you should quietly go back to Smurfy Road to the east.

rooms.name: Vampire Grumpy Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
This is Vampire Grumpy Smurf's home.
He is pissed at you.  Of course, he is pissed at everyone.
So don't take it bad.  Maybe you'd better leave before he really
gets mad.  Smurfy Road to the east is your only salvation.

rooms.name: Vampire Jokey Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
You pull the top of his house and it explodes in your face.
That Vampire Jokey Smurf, what a kidder.
You can hear his laughter as you wipe the ashes off
your face.  You better get even.  Smurfy Road is to the north.

rooms.name: Vampire Papa Smurf's Home
rooms.description:
It's the home of the leader of the smurfs.  Vampire Papa Smurf has a
nicely decorated home.  He takes pride in his work.
You could get to know him or just squash him.
If Vampire Papa Smurf is not here he is probably at vampire Smurfette's
using his Dominate powers on her.  A stone path lies to the north.

rooms.name: Path to Gargamel's Castle
rooms.description:
You are walking along a path to Gargamel's Castle to the North.
Smurfy Road lies to the south.

rooms.name: Outside Gargamel's Castle
rooms.description:
You are standing outside Gargamel's Castle.  You can hear him screaming at
Azreal from inside.  You can also him cursing out those wretched smurfs.
His Castle is to the north while Smurfy Road is to the south.

rooms.name: Gargamel's Castle
rooms.description:
This is Gargamel's Castle.  His big black kettle is in the middle of the room.
Where else would he put it?  The place has only one room.

rooms.name: Vampire Smurfette's House
rooms.description:
This house is conveniently next to Vampire Papa Smurfs.
Makes it easier for Vampire Papa Smurf to sneak over at night.
I hope he uses protection.  I would hate to have more little
vampire smurfs running around.  The only exit is to the east.
